name: Wet Hack
description:
You have 64 seconds to sneak around hacking as many eyeball-on-leg monsters as you can.

#LowRezJam2017 entry inspired by Nethack. Roguelike sandbox voxel physics, developed by my PixiVoxel game engine.  Far from finished because I didn't have enough time to include everything I wanted.

Controls

  • WASD = movement
  • Melee attack = 1 (number pad)
    or
  • Arrow keys = movement
  • Melee attack = Z
    or
  • Use a game controller

Features

  • Voxel sandbox
  • physics
  • raycast graphics
  • (more to follow)

Coming soon

  • bombs
  • more monsters
  • potions
  • more sound effects
  • etc.

Requirements

  • XP
  • 0.5Ghz CPU
  • 1GB RAM
  • 32MB Video
